namespace.name: Remotion.Data.Linq.EagerFetching
namespace.para: re-linq provides an infrastructure for eager fetching, which can easily be integrated into LINQ providers based on re-linq. To make use of eager fetching, first supply a set of extension methods:

This will result in parsed query models containing instances of . Extract them via from within your implementation. Then use to get a new query for each fetch request which specifies what objects should be fetched. These objects should not influence the result of the query, but they should be pre-fetched for performance reasons.
